title.description: Specify a string that would be used for document title.

author.description: Specify a string that would be used for document author.

stepmargin.description: Left margin increment (in centimeters) for each indentation. Must be set between 0 and 10. Default is 0.85

sampstyle.description: Set it to *code* for showing code samples, set to *line* for showing normal samples.

sampwrap.description: Set it to an integer for which lines longer than this will be wrapped. Set it to 0 will turn the feature off.

sampmargin.description: Left margin for sample block. Must be set between 0 and 10. Default is 0.85

sampruby.description: Set it to true to allow rubification of Japanese text in SAMP blocks.

outlineonly.description: Set it to true to show only headings.

sections.description: Set it to one or more heading numbers (separated by spaces) for which its contents will be shown in when *outlineonly* mode is on.

showlabels.description: Set it to true to show a label that is assigned to each sectional headings as well as to figures, tables, and listings.

showids.description: Set it to true to show the CSS ID that is assigned to each sectional headings as well as to figures, tables, and listings.

previewimages.description: Set to true to show images inside the PREVIEW. Set to false to not show images inside the PREVIEW. Default is true.

outlinelevel.description: Set it to a number between 0-3 where 0 is for showing all headings, 1 for chapters, 2 will include section, 3 will include subsection, and 4 will include subsubsection.

verbminwidth.description: Set it to an integer that it is the minimum width for a VERB block.

pictframe.description: Set it to true if a frame is to be added around the entire PICT block or a figure. Set it to false if no frame should be added. The default is false.

verbframe.description: Set it to true if a frame is to be added around the entire VERB block. Set it to false if no frame should be added. The default is true.

codenumbers.description: Set it to true if line numbering should also be shown for code listing. Set it to false if no line numbering is shown. Default is true.

quotquotation.description: Set it to true if quotation marks are to be added to the entire quoted block. Set it to false if no quotation marks should be added. Default is true.

sbjtalign.description: Set it to *left*, *center*, *right* for the text-alignment of the subject text.

autoruby.description: Set to a list of block types for which automatic rubification should be done

descbullet.description: Set to a Unicode code point string such as 0x23 that is to be placed in front of each description items.

latexdocumentclass.description: Specify the document class that is for LATEX translation, such as *report*. The default is empty, in which case *article* is chosen for non-book generation and *book* is chosen for book generation.

latextwocolumn.description: Set it to true if two column is to be shown for a page.

latexa4paper.description: Set it to true if *a4paper* is going to be specified as part of the option to *geometry* package.

latextwoside.description: Set it to true if *twoside* is going to be specified as part of the option to *geometry* package.

latexparskip.description: Set it to true to simulate the effect of the 'parskip' package, that each paragraph is visibly separated by extra vertical spaces inserted and no indentation is produced. Set it to false to disable this behavior.

latexstepmargin.description: Left margin increment (in centimeters) for each indentation. Must be set between 0 and 2.0. Default is 0.85

latexsampwrap.description: Set it to an integer for which lines longer than this will be wrapped. Set it to 0 will turn the feature off.

latexsampmargin.description: Set it to the left margin of a SMPL block.

latexleftmargin.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the left margin in centimeters.

latexrightmargin.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the right margin in centimeters.

latextopmargin.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the top margin in centimeters.

latexleftmarginTC.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the left margin in centimeters.

latexrightmarginTC.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the right margin in centimeters.

latextopmarginTC.description: Set it to a positive number expressing the top margin in centimeters.

latextablestyle.description: Specify a style for all longtables.
